original_title: Images of Atlantis: The Photography of Milton Rogovin
overview: Milton Rogovin is an 82-year-old photographer in Buffalo, New York, who began taking photographs in the â€˜50s. In this programme, Rogovin discusses his work, whilst the subjects of his photographs talk about their lives and attitudes to being photographed.
title: Images of Atlantis: The Photography of Milton Rogovin
